roleset.name: cause to be not valid

example.name: oddly intransitive
example.text: Once she did so , the big - souled German maestro with the shaky nerves who so often cancels offered a limpid , flowing performance that in its unswagged and unswaggering approach was totally at odds with the staging .

example.name: sounds better transitive
example.text: Speaking of dark nights , the Met 's next - door neighbor , the New York City Opera , has canceled its season after failing to reach a settlement with its musicians , who wanted pay parity with the the Chicago Lyric and San Francisco Opera orchestras .

propbank.arg: the Met 's next - door neighbor , the New York City Opera
after failing to reach a settlement with its musicians , who wanted pay parity with the the Chicago Lyric and San Francisco Opera orchestras

example.name: both args
example.text: MCC 's cancellation of a software liscense

CANCELLATION-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to cancel.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from cancellation.01-n)
